code:
gantt
    title Roadmap MVP - Arquitectura Edge+Central Farmacia
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    section Fase 1: MVP (8-10 semanas)
    Infraestructura Base           :done, infra, 2024-01-15, 2024-01-28
    POS + Inventario Local         :done, pos, 2024-01-29, 2024-02-11
    Agenda + WhatsApp              :active, agenda, 2024-02-12, 2024-02-25
    Sincronización Edge-Central    :sync, 2024-02-26, 2024-03-10
    Observabilidad + Hardening     :obs, 2024-03-11, 2024-03-24
    Piloto + Validación           :pilot, 2024-03-25, 2024-04-07
    
    section Fase 2: Procurement + IA
    Módulo Procurement            :proc, 2024-04-08, 2024-05-19
    Market Intelligence + BYOM    :ia, 2024-05-20, 2024-06-30
    
    section Fase 3: Escalamiento
    Multi-tienda (5-10 tiendas)   :scale1, 2024-07-01, 2024-08-11
    Optimizaciones + Analytics    :opt, 2024-08-12, 2024-09-22

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 8-10 semanas 和 5-10 tiendas 的逻辑。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 8-10 semanas处理。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 '8-10 semanas处理'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
